notes: [Fixed] Enabled plugins passed as lower camelcase names instead of underscored.
[Improved] Updated Froala Editor from v2.4.0 to v2.4.1.
[Added] Support for custom CSS classes and stylesheet file (plugin-wide and per field setting).
[Added] Custom theme to make editr in style of Craft CMS.
[Fixed] Database column type set to TEXT instead of VARCHAR. Will be fixed for fields after update (migration).
[Fixed] Edit existing link in edito via Craft's link entry modal
[Fixed] Replacing images in editor opens Craft's Asset modal again [#1 theskyfloor]
[Added] Added support for using image transforms in image replace modal [#3 lboaretto]
[Added] Support for control + save to save the entry
